text: Ronnie Lombard (born 28 July 1928) was a South African gymnast. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics and the 1956 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Possibly living people Category:South African male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of South Africa Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Ronnie Lombard
